about_the_game:
Shuichi is an ordinary young man studying at the chemistry department of one of the most prestigious universities in the city of Sonzai. He has great friends, great grades, and the perfect boyfriend who cares about him.
But as often happens, behind a beautiful picture we do not see flaws.





About the game
The events of the game will take place in the world of cyberpunk. Thanks to the visual style and design, you will be able to immerse yourself in this atmosphere.


You will also be able to meet many interesting characters. Each of them plays an important role in the path of the main character. Someone can change your life for the better, and someone can completely destroy it.



About gameplay

During the game, you will face choices that will affect the further events of the plot and the ending. There are also mini games that will also affect the development of events.

content_descriptors.notes: There are scenes of sexual violence, mentions and hints of drugs. Sometimes you can see sprites with blood and some other possibly unpleasant things for sensitive people. So please consider this before playing game.

name: Neon City of Desires
short_description: The world is becoming more and more modern, but mental problems remain with humanity. Immerse yourself in this world with the main characters and find out what fate will befall them. Is this really the city of dreams?
